body:
i'm thankful that when i was walking miso this morning, though it was dark, i stopped her before she started licking a dead toad in the middle of the street.

i'm thankful for phillip larkin's poem "[the mower](https://www.poetryfoundation.org/poems/48423/the-mower-56d229a740294)," for the blades of hard enjambments and punctuation, for the use of the word "unmendably," for the desperate hope of the ending.

i'm thankful for the episode of _hamilton's pharmacopeia_ about [the psychedelic toad](https://www.viceland.com/en_us/video/hamiltons-pharmacopeia-the-psychedelic-toad/59cd5cd7c6e1eb5725458fdc).

i'm thankful that in fifth grade, i had a t-shirt with a picture of rainforest frogs on it and my teacher gave me the nickname "frog man"
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful that when i was walking miso this morning, though it was dark, i stopped her before she started licking a dead toad in the middle of the street.

i'm thankful for phillip larkin's poem "[the mower](https://www.poetryfoundation.org/poems/48423/the-mower-56d229a740294)," for the blades of hard enjambments and punctuation, for the use of the word "unmendably," for the desperate hope of the ending.

i'm thankful for the episode of _hamilton's pharmacopeia_ about [the psychedelic toad](https://www.viceland.com/en_us/video/hamiltons-pharmacopeia-the-psychedelic-toad/59cd5cd7c6e1eb5725458fdc).

i'm thankful that in fifth grade, i had a t-shirt with a picture of rainforest frogs on it and my teacher gave me the nickname "frog man"
